description: Learn how to make a delicious slice that combines oat crumble and a jammy raspberry filling. The fresh raspberries add sublime flavour and a pop of colour.
name: Raspberry & Oat Crumble Slice Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200°C/180°C fan-forced. Grease and line a 17.5 x 27.5cm (3.5cm deep) slice pan with baking paper.
Place oats, flour, brown sugar, coconut, baking powder, cinnamon, hazelnuts and butter in a large bowl. Mix to combine.
Spoon two-thirds of the oat mixture into pan and, using back of a metal spoon, press mixture down firmly to compact. Bake for 20 minutes or until it starts to brown.
Meanwhile, place raspberries, cornflour and caster sugar in a separate bowl. Combine by lightly crushing with a fork.

Spread raspberry mixture over oat mixture to form an even layer. Scatter remaining oat mixture over raspberry mixture, then bake for 35 minutes or until golden and cooked. Cool completely in pan before cutting into squares. Serve.
